description: Put Ledger Account Summary Request-Add Only

Ledger_Account_SummaryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Ledger_Account_SummaryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.

Ledger_Account_SummaryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Put Ledger Account Summary Request-Ledger Account Summaries Data

validation.validation: The Account Set of all Ledger Account Summaries must be the same.
validation.description: The Account Set of all Ledger Account Summaries must be the same.

validation.validation: This Ledger Account Summary contains overlapping Ledger Account ranges. Please modify the From Value or the To Value on one or more contained Ledger Account ranges so they do not overlap with each other.
validation.description: The included Ledger Account ranges must not overlap with each other in a Ledger Account Summary.

validation.validation: The Account Set of the Ledger Accounts and the Ledger Summary must be the same.
validation.description: The Account Set of the Ledger Accounts and the Ledger Summary must be the same.

validation.validation: A hierarchy structure has been defined for this ledger account summary. Please delete the hierarchy structure before including it as a child of this ledger account summary.
validation.description: A hierarchy structure has been defined for this ledger account summary. Please delete the hierarchy structure before including it as a child of this ledger account summary.

validation.validation: Ledger Account Summaries included must be exclusively of Income Statement Type Accounts where the Ledger Account Summary is in use by a Business Plan Year.
Ledger Account Summaries included must be exclusively of Income Statement Type Accounts where the Ledger Account Summary is in use by a Business Plan Year.

A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this Ledger Account Summary. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the Hierarchy Level for this Ledger Account Summary.
A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this Ledger Account Summary. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the included Ledger Account Summaries.

A ledger account cannot belong to more than one ledger account summary that rolls up to the highest level in the hierarchy.

The following ledger accounts are included in specific ledger accounts or are included in account ranges in other ledger account summaries:

[Ledger Accounts with issues]

Please update the ledger account summary to ensure that each ledger account belongs to one ledger account summary.
"[name]" is already in use in "[ledger account summary]" on "[date]". Enter a unique Summary Name for the Account Set.
Effective Date must be greater than equal to 01/01/1900
A Ledger Account Summary cannot be included in itself.  This might be a result of an included Ledger Account Summary several levels down.

A Ledger Account Summary cannot belong to more than one parent Ledger Summary that rolls up to the highest level in the hierarchy.

The following Ledger Account Summaries are present in more than one parent Ledger Account Summary:

[comma separated duplicate ledger account summaries]

Please update the Ledger Account Summaries to ensure that each Ledger Account Summary belongs to one parent Ledger Account Summary.

A future effective dated ledger account summary cannot be included in the current ledger account summary.
 
The following future effective dated ledger account summaries are included in the current ledger account summary:
 
[comma separated Ledger Account Summaries]

Please update the effective date of the above ledger account summaries before including them in the current ledger account summary.

An account range in one ledger account summary cannot overlap with another ledger account summary that rolls up to the highest level in the hierarchy.

The following ledger account summaries have overlapping account ranges:

[comma separated overlapping ranges ledger account summaries with date]

Please update the ledger account summaries to ensure that account ranges do not overlap.
